1: קִרְב֤וּ <sup>7126 </sup> <n>Come near</n> גוֹיִם֙ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>ye nations</n> לִשְׁמֹ֔עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>to hear</n> וּלְאֻמִּ֖ים <sup>3816 </sup> <n>ye people</n> הַקְשִׁ֑יבוּ <sup>7181 </sup> <n>and hearken</n> תִּשְׁמַ֤ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hear</n> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>let the earth</n> וּמְלֹאָ֔הּ <sup>4393 </sup> <n>and all that is therein</n> תֵּבֵ֖ל <sup>8398 </sup> <n>the world</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> צֶאֱצָאֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>6631 </sup> <n>and all things that come forth</n>
2: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> קֶ֤צֶף <sup>7110 </sup> <n>For the indignation</n> לַֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>is against</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>[is] upon all nations</n> וְחֵמָ֖ה <sup>2534 </sup> <n>and [his] fury</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> צְבָאָ֑ם <sup>6635 </sup> <n>upon all their armies</n> הֶחֱרִימָ֖ם <sup>2763 </sup> <n>he hath utterly destroyed</n> נְתָנָ֥ם <sup>5414 </sup> <n>them he hath delivered</n> לַטָּֽבַח׃ <sup>2874 </sup> <n>them to the slaughter</n>
3: וְחַלְלֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>2491 </sup> <n>Their slain</n> יֻשְׁלָ֔כוּ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>also shall be cast out</n> וּפִגְרֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>6297 </sup> <n>out of their carcases</n> יַעֲלֶ֣ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>shall come up</n> בָאְשָׁ֑ם <sup>889 </sup> <n>and their stink</n> וְנָמַ֥סּוּ <sup>4549 </sup> <n>shall be melted</n> הָרִ֖ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>and the mountains</n> מִדָּמָֽם׃ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>with their blood</n>
4: וְנָמַ֙קּוּ֙ <sup>4743 </sup> <n>shall be dissolved</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> צְבָ֣א <sup>6635 </sup> <n>And all the host</n> הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heaven</n> וְנָגֹ֥לּוּ <sup>1556 </sup> <n>shall be rolled together</n> כַסֵּ֖פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>as a scroll</n> הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>and the heavens</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> צְבָאָ֣ם <sup>6635 </sup> <n>and all their host</n> יִבּ֔וֹל <sup>5034 </sup> <n>shall fall down</n> כִּנְבֹ֤ל <sup>5034 </sup> <n>falleth off</n> עָלֶה֙ <sup>5929 </sup> <n>as the leaf</n> מִגֶּ֔פֶן <sup>1612 </sup> <n>from the vine</n> וּכְנֹבֶ֖לֶת <sup>5034 </sup> <n>and as a falling</n> מִתְּאֵנָֽה׃ <sup>8384 </sup> <n>[fig] from the fig tree</n>
5: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> רִוְּתָ֥ה <sup>7301 </sup> <n>shall be bathed</n> בַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>in heaven</n> חַרְבִּ֑י <sup>2719 </sup> <n>For my sword</n> הִנֵּה֙ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> אֱד֣וֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>upon Idumea</n> תֵּרֵ֔ד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>behold it shall come down</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and upon</n> עַ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and upon the people</n> חֶרְמִ֖י <sup>2764 </sup> <n>of my curse</n> לְמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>to judgment</n>
6: חֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>The sword</n> לַיהוָ֞ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> מָלְאָ֥ה <sup>4390 </sup> <n>is filled</n> דָם֙ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>with blood</n> הֻדַּ֣שְׁנָה <sup>1878 </sup> <n>it is made fat</n> מֵחֵ֔לֶב <sup>2459 </sup> <n>with fatness</n> מִדַּ֤ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>[and] with the blood</n> כָּרִים֙ <sup>3733 </sup> <n>of lambs</n> וְעַתּוּדִ֔ים <sup>6260 </sup> <n>and goats</n> מֵחֵ֖לֶב <sup>2459 </sup> <n>with the fat</n> כִּלְי֣וֹת <sup>3629 </sup> <n>of the kidneys</n> אֵילִ֑ים <sup>352 </sup> <n>of rams</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>has a</n> זֶ֤בַח <sup>2077 </sup> <n>hath a sacrifice</n> לַֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> בְּבָצְרָ֔ה <sup>1224 </sup> <n>in Bozrah</n> וְטֶ֥בַח <sup>2874 </sup> <n>slaughter</n> גָּד֖וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>and a great</n> בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> אֱדֽוֹם׃ <sup>123 </sup> <n>of Idumea</n>
7: וְיָרְד֤וּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>shall come down</n> רְאֵמִים֙ <sup>7214 </sup> <n>And the unicorns</n> עִמָּ֔ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>them</n> וּפָרִ֖ים <sup>6499 </sup> <n>with them and the bullocks</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אַבִּירִ֑ים <sup>47 </sup> <n>with the bulls</n> וְרִוְּתָ֤ה <sup>7301 </sup> <n>shall be soaked</n> אַרְצָם֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and their land</n> מִדָּ֔ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>with blood</n> וַעֲפָרָ֖ם <sup>6083 </sup> <n>and their dust</n> מֵחֵ֥לֶב <sup>2459 </sup> <n>with fatness</n> יְדֻשָּֽׁן׃ <sup>1878 </sup> <n>made fat</n>
8: כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>has a</n> י֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>For [it is] the day</n> נָקָ֖ם <sup>5359 </sup> <n>vengeance</n> לַֽיהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD'S</n> שְׁנַ֥ת <sup>8141 </sup> <n>[and] the year</n> שִׁלּוּמִ֖ים <sup>7966 </sup> <n>of recompences</n> לְרִ֥יב <sup>7379 </sup> <n>for the controversy</n> צִיּֽוֹן׃ <sup>6726 </sup> <n>of Zion</n>
9: וְנֶהֶפְכ֤וּ <sup>2015 </sup> <n>thereof shall be turned</n> נְחָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>5158 </sup> <n>And the streams</n> לְזֶ֔פֶת <sup>2203 </sup> <n>into pitch</n> וַעֲפָרָ֖הּ <sup>6083 </sup> <n>and the dust</n> לְגָפְרִ֑ית <sup>1614 </sup> <n>thereof into brimstone</n> וְהָיְתָ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> אַרְצָ֔הּ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and the land</n> לְזֶ֖פֶת <sup>2203 </sup> <n>pitch</n> בֹּעֵרָֽה׃ <sup>1197 </sup> <n>thereof shall become burning</n>
10: לַ֤יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>night</n> וְיוֹמָם֙ <sup>3119 </sup> <n>nor day</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִכְבֶּ֔ה <sup>3518 </sup> <n>It shall not be quenched</n> לְעוֹלָ֖ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n> יַעֲלֶ֣ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>thereof shall go up</n> עֲשָׁנָ֑הּ <sup>6227 </sup> <n>the smoke</n> מִדּ֤וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>from generation</n> לָדוֹר֙ <sup>1755 </sup> <n>to generation</n> תֶּחֱרָ֔ב <sup>2717 </sup> <n>it shall lie waste</n> לְנֵ֣צַח <sup>5331 </sup> <n>it for ever</n> נְצָחִ֔ים <sup>5331 </sup> <n>and ever</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>None</n> עֹבֵ֖ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>none shall pass through</n> בָּֽהּ׃
11: וִירֵשׁ֙וּהָ֙ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>shall possess</n> קָאַ֣ת <sup>6893 </sup> <n>But the cormorant</n> וְקִפּ֔וֹד <sup>7090 </sup> <n>and the bittern</n> וְיַנְשׁ֥וֹף <sup>3244 </sup> <n>it the owl</n> וְעֹרֵ֖ב <sup>6158 </sup> <n>also and the raven</n> יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <sup>7931 </sup> <n>shall dwell</n> בָ֑הּ וְנָטָ֥ה <sup>5186 </sup> <n>in it and he shall stretch out</n> עָלֶ֛יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> קַֽו־ <sup>6957 </sup> <n>upon it the line</n> תֹ֖הוּ <sup>8414 </sup> <n>of confusion</n> וְאַבְנֵי־ <sup>68 </sup> <n>and the stones</n> בֹֽהוּ׃ <sup>922 </sup> <n>of emptiness</n>
12: חֹרֶ֥יהָ <sup>2715 </sup> <n>the nobles</n> וְאֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> מְלוּכָ֣ה <sup>4410 </sup> <n>thereof to the kingdom</n> יִקְרָ֑אוּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>They shall call</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>its</n> שָׂרֶ֖יהָ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>but none [shall be] there and all her princes</n> יִ֥הְיוּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אָֽפֶס׃ <sup>657 </sup> <n>shall be nothing</n>

16: דִּרְשׁ֨וּ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>Seek ye out</n> מֵֽעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>from</n> סֵ֤פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>of the book</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וּֽקְרָ֔אוּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and read</n> אַחַ֤ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>no one</n> מֵהֵ֙נָּה֙ <sup>2007 </sup> <n>of these</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> נֶעְדָּ֔רָה <sup>5737 </sup> <n>shall fail</n> אִשָּׁ֥ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>none</n> רְעוּתָ֖הּ <sup>7468 </sup> <n>her mate</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> פָקָ֑דוּ <sup>6485 </sup> <n>shall want</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> פִי֙ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>for my mouth</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> צִוָּ֔ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>it hath commanded</n> וְרוּח֖וֹ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>and his spirit</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> קִבְּצָֽן׃ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>it hath gathered</n>
17: וְהֽוּא־ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> הִפִּ֤יל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>And he hath cast</n> לָהֶן֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> גּוֹרָ֔ל <sup>1486 </sup> <n>the lot</n> וְיָד֛וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>for them and his hand</n> חִלְּקַ֥תָּה <sup>2505 </sup> <n>hath divided</n> לָהֶ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>by</n> בַּקָּ֑ו <sup>6957 </sup> <n>it unto them by line</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>it for</n> עוֹלָם֙ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>ever</n> יִֽירָשׁ֔וּהָ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>they shall possess</n> לְד֥וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>from generation</n> וָד֖וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>to generation</n> יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <sup>7931 </sup> <n>shall they dwell</n> בָֽהּ׃ ס
